body.name: Evolur Cheyenne 5 in 1 Full Panel Convertible Crib in Antique Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE scheduled delivery as soon as Monday, February 26, 8 AM - 8 PM
features: POWER DRESSING, NURSERY STYLE - Inspired by Roman architecture, the Cheyenne 5-in-1 Convertible Crib features a high-arch headboard with traditional dentil molding, fluting, and imperial feet. Crafted out of kiln-dried hardwood with fine veneers.

5-in-1 CONVERTIBILITY - The Cheyenne converts to a toddler bed with our conversion kit (sold separately) and daybed. Add our wooden bed frame (sold separately) to convert it into a full-size bed. It also features 3 mattress height settings.Avoid Direct sunlight

TIMELESS FINISHES - The Cheyenne is available in three handsome finishes - Antique Brown, Antique Mist, Storm Grey. Mix and match with modern and classic color palettes to create a truly special space for your baby.

SAFETY FIRST - Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA, and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations.

A LIFETIME INVESTMENT - Pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Cheyenne Collection like the Double Dresser, Tall Chest, Nightstand, and Hutch to create a timeless nursery. Crib dimensions are 58.25″ L(W) x 31.25″ W(D) x 53.00″ H and weighs 90 lbs.
body.description: Inspired by Roman architecture, the Cheyenne 5-in-1 Convertible Crib features a high-arch headboard with traditional dentil molding, fluting, and imperial feet. With a strong body and unmistakable presence, the Cheyenne is a statement maker. This is power dressing, nursery style Constructed out of kiln-dried hardwood with hardwood veneers, the Cheyenne is built to last and is truly a lifetime investment. We believe in creating furniture that evolves with your growing child. The Cheyenne 5-in-1 Convertible Crib does exactly that. The Cheyenne features 3 mattress height settings that can be adjusted depending on your child. Set it at its highest setting during the newborn months and lower it as your child starts to pull up and stand. It converts to a toddler bed with our conversion kit (sold separately) and daybed. Add our wooden bed frame (sold separately) to convert it into a full-size bed. The Cheyenne is available in three sophisticated finishes - Antique Brown, Antique Mist and Storm Grey. Mix and match with colors and textures to create an inviting space At Evolur, safety is always our No.1 priority - Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA, and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations. Pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Cheyenne Collection like the Double Dresser, Tall Chest, Hutch, and Nightstand to create a timeless nursery. Crib dimensions are 58.25″ L(W) x 31.25″ W(D) x 53.00″ H and weighs 90 lbs. For the best mattress fit, we recommend any Dream on Me or Evolur standard, full-size, non-toxic, Greenguard certified crib mattress (sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have Evolur furniture for all our babies and absolutely love the quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this crib!!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical to order a crib from Amazon but this was 100% worth the money. I first saw it on the Huck Finn website from Albany and started searching around because I wanted free shipping with it. The only downside was the shipping, Amazon shipped through XPO and my first crib was lost so I had to reorder. We got it assembled last night in literally 25 minutes and it is beautiful!! It's such a good quality. I am extremely happy with this purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my nursery set
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with my nursery set from Evolur. I do love both the dresser & the crib. The wood quality & the work on the wood is exceptional. Evolur also has great customer service. The back board of the crib came broken from shipping but when I contacted cusomer service, I was able to get a replacement for the part. I would highly recommend both products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our daughters nursery! We love it. It fits perfectly in her room. It’s sturdy and was easy to put together. We got the matching dresser as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Received damaged - again
reviews.reviewText: Two problems. First, Evelour makes an inferior product - zero quality control. You'd think we bought a cheap $100 crib rather than the $700+ we spent on this. The first one we bought had parts of each siderail missing paint; one of those siderails was also cracking where they put wood filler in and painted over it; top rail of the foot board had a crack completely through it, leaving a sharp edge that would certainly harm any child inside of it. Shipping care is also an issue. Both times the box looked like it had been dropped, drug, and stepped on causing additional damage. Will not buy from Evelour again, regardless if it's being sold by Amazon, BuyBuy Baby, or any other retailer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thank you the crib is beautiful!Amazon you’re amazing service is excellent.Thank you so much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: We have the Evolur Santa Fe crib for our son and have been so impressed by the sturdiness and the finish which holds up to toddlers that we went with the same set of furniture but tried out the Cheyenne crib this time. We had to assemble this crib since Amazon didn’t have a white glove delivery option and it was very simple. Overall the quality seems higher than many other nursery furniture options seen in store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Paint chips easily
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter's first baby. It stayed in the box at my house for over a month until the nursery was ready. We took it to her and were extremely careful only to open it and find a large chip of paint missing on the headboard.
